content.rendered:
Wholesale Shop

HonesTEA (ENGLISH BREAKFAST)

A beautifully classic full-bodies black tea blend, made from the highest quality whole leaf Sri Lankan tea. A delightful breakfast tea that can be enjoyed anytime of the day, on its own or with milk or lemon.
100% certified organic Sri Lankan black tea.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in Sri Lanka.

ImmuniTEA (DEFENCE)

A protecting, rejuvenating and healing tea with a lovely light earthy flavour with hints of mint and lemongrass, ideal for anytime of the day. This tea contains immune strengthening herbs that help bolster the immune defences to fight off colds and flu and other infections.
100% certified organic Echinacea, spearmint, elderflower, ginger root, elderberry and lemongrass.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in Nepal, Bulgaria, Germany, Hungary, and Egypt.

PuriTEA (DETOXING)

This award-winning detox tea is made with cleansing and liver tonic herbs which enhance liver detoxification and assist with removal of toxins from the body. It has a fresh floral taste with hints of lemongrass and mint.

Made with 100% certified organic St Mary’s thistle, ginger, calendula, lemongrass, spearmint & schisandra berries.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in Egypt, Poland, China.

ViridiTEA (PROTECTIVE)

A hint of jasmine gives this delicately-flavoured green tea blend a unique freshness and vitality. Our beautiful green tea blend is made with antioxidant rich green tea that helps boost metabolism, and reduce the risk of cancer, heart disease and type-2 diabetes. This tea has no bitter after taste.

100% certified organic sencha green tea and jasmine green tea.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in China.

SereniTEA (CALMING)

This is a wonderfully soothing tea with delicate, earthy and floral notes. Touches of lemon and spearmint give a delightful freshness to the palate. This lovely tea is made with herbs that calm the nervous system and allow the mind and body to relax.

100% certified organic chamomile, spearmint, lemon verbena, lavender and lemon balm.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in Germany, China and Egypt.

TranquiliTEA (SLEEP)

A comforting night-time tea with a smooth sublte sweetness and soothing licorice after taste. Our gorgeous sleep time tea is made with nervous system calming herbs that help the mind and body relax to promote a better night sleep.

100% certified organic licorice, aniseed, fennel, valerian, and passionflower.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in Italy, Egypt, and Netherlands.

ZesTEA (INVIGORATING)

This fresh and flavoursome lemon tea is vibrant and uplifting with a delightful harmony of ginger and zesty lemon. This is the perfect choice for those who love ginger tea. This tea contains the super herb turmeric, which has been studied extensively for its powerful anti-inflammatory and liver protective effects. This tea also contains the lovely native Australian herb lemon myrtle. This is a great anti-inflammatory and antioxidant tea.

100% certified organic ginger, lemongrass, lemon peel, turmeric, and lemon myrtle.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in Australia, Nepal, Ghana and Egypt.

VitaliTEA (REVITALISING)

An invigorating tea, exceptionally uplifting with its fresh minty taste and soft orange and ginger undertones. This fabulous tea contains adaptogenic herbs that support adrenal function so your body can deal with stress is a healthier way. Its great for boosting vitality and energy and ideal for tired and stressed individuals.

100% certified organic peppermint, spearmint, ginger, sweet orange peel, withania, Siberian ginseng and bacopa.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in India, China, Nepal, Ghana and Egypt.

LongeviTEA (ANTIOXIDANTS)

A perfect antioxidant tea blend of sweet and tartness to delight and enliven the senses. This ruby red tea is refreshing with subtle fruity undertones. Perfect served hot or as an iced tea with fresh lime or citrus fruits. This is our super antioxidant tea, made with teas and herbs abundant in powerful antioxidants and vitamin C, which boost collagen production, promote healthy skin, and reduce the risk of premature ageing, and chronic diseases like cancer, and heart disease.

100% certified organic hibiscus, rosehip, apple, white tea and goji berries.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in South Africa, Germany, China and Egypt.

Masala Chai (SPICED TEA)

A delicate blend of medium-bodied black tea and rich aromatic spices, with earthy cinnamon highlights. The spices in this blend are lovely and warming. They help stimulate circulation, support healthy digestion and have a blood sugar levels balancing effect.

100% certified organic cinnamon, black tea, ginger, cloves, cardamom, and aniseed.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in Nepal, Sri Lanka, Guatemala and Egypt.

Sticky Chai

This beautiful hand blended sticky chai is made with the finest quality freshly ground spices and black tea infused with locally sourced certified organic raw honey. This sticky chai has a perfect balance of sweet and spicy and contains herbs that help support healthy digestion and promotes better circulation. We are proud to have partnered with Save the Bees Australia.

Made from 100% certified organic raw honey, Ceylon cinnamon, black tea, ginger, cloves, cardamom, and aniseed.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in Nepal, Sri Lanka, Guatemala and Egypt.

Vegan Sticky Chai

This beautiful hand blended vegan sticky chai is made with the finest quality freshly ground spices and black tea infused with certified organic coconut nectar. This sticky chai has a perfect balance of sweet and spicy and contains herbs that help support healthy digestion and promotes better circulation.

100% certified organic coconut nectar, Ceylon cinnamon, black tea, ginger, cloves, cardamom, and aniseed.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in South Africa, Sri Lanka, Ghana, Pakistan & Albania.

Black BeauTEA (FRENCH EARL GREY)

A fragrant, French inspired Earl Grey of traditional bergamont infused with fruity and floral notes. Made with herbs rich in antioxidants which reduce oxidative damage in the body, along with having a calming and mood balancing effect.

Made with 100% certified organic Earl Grey, mango, sweet orange peel, rose petals, and cornflower blue petals.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in South Africa, Sri Lanka, Ghana, Pakistan & Albania.

Mother’s Milk (BREAST FEEDING)

100% certified organic fenugreek, fennel, raspberry leaf, alfalfa, lemon verbena and nettle.
This nourishing tea for mothers is made with herbs traditionally used to help enhance breast milk production.

Origin

Sourced from organic farms in Egypt and Croatia.

PositiviTEA (MOOD)

This beautiful uplifting botanical blend of mint and lemongrass with a subtle sweetness, will brighten your mood and liven the senses. The herbs in this delicious tea are used by herbalists and naturopaths to treat mild to moderate depression.

Made with 100% certified organic lemongrass, St John’s wort, licorice, spearmint, rhodiola and lemon balm.

Origin

CognitiviTEA (MEMORY)

A delightful energising tea blend of mint and green tea with a burst of citrus will inspire and invigorate the mind. The herbs in this delicious tea positively effect cognition and brain function. They help improve memory and focus and assist with increasing mental clarity.

Made with 100% certified organic Sencha green tea, gingko, turmeric, bacopa, peppermint, lemon peel and lemongrass.

Origin

Hot ChocolaTEA

This herbal infused cacao powder contains organic adaptogenic herbs and medicinal mushrooms that can help support immune and adrenal health, to enhance the body’s resistance to stress and disease.

Made with 100% certified organic fair trade raw cacao, true cinnamon, ashwagandha, astragalus, and lion’s mane, cordyceps and chaga mushrooms.

Origin

Our certified organic fair trade raw cacao is sourced from the Tarapoto region in Peru. Medicinal mushrooms are from certified organic farms in Zhejiang Province of China. Other herbs in this blend are from certified farms in India.

LuminosiTEA

This turmeric and ginger latte powder with wild marine collagen helps support skin, gut and joint health.

Made with organic turmeric, organic cinnamon, wild marine based collagen, organic ginger and organic black peppercorns.

Origin

Spices sourced from certified organic farms in Sri Lanka and India. Our marine collagen peptide is made from the highest quality wild red snapper.

Eco Flower Glass Tea Flask

This brilliant Bodhi eco flower glass tea flask is ideal for tea lovers on the go. It makes the perfect eco friendly alternative to take away cups for cafes. Our flasks come with a stainless steel infuser and bamboo lid, and a black thermal cover.

Origin

ECO Stainless Steel Tea Flask Black

This beautiful black ECO Stainless Steel Tea Flask is perfect for tea lovers on the go. This sturdy double walled, BPA-free, vacuum insulated flask keeps tea hot for 12 hours and iced tea cold for 24 hours.

Origin

ECO Stainless Steel Tea Flask White

This beautiful white ECO Stainless Steel Tea Flask is perfect for tea lovers on the go. This sturdy double walled, BPA-free, vacuum insulated flask keeps tea hot for 12 hours and iced tea cold for 24 hours.

Origin

Wellness Sampler Pack

Each sampler pack contains 7 certified organic loose leaf teas (approx. 3 serves each) all beautifully presented in an environmentally friendly Bodhi reusable organic cotton pouch.

Origin

Teas, herbs and spices sourced from certified organic farms in Australia and around the globe.

Traditional Sampler Pack

Each sampler pack contains 7 traditional certified organic loose leaf teas (approx. 3 serves each) all beautifully presented in an environmentally friendly Bodhi reusable organic cotton pouch.

Origin

Teas, herbs and spices sourced from certified organic farms in Australia and around the globe.

Gift Boxes

This gift set contains three boxes of Bodhi Organic Tea of your choice with a Bodhi engraved spoon. Please include the names of the teas you would like in the message box when you check out.

Origin

Bodhi Infuser & Tea Gift Set

This lovely gift set contains a Bodhi engraved stainless steel tea infuser and serving spoon, and two boxes of Bodhi Organic Tea of your choice. Please include the names of the two teas you would like in the message box when you check out.

Origin

Bodhi Infuser & Spoon Set

Our Bodhi engraved stainless steel tea infuser & spoon set is just what you need to make the perfect cup of loose leaf tea while enhancing your teas therapeutic benefits.

Origin

Bodhi Stainless Steel Tea infuser

Our Bodhi engraved stainless steel tea infuser is just what you need to make the perfect cup of loose leaf tea while enhancing your teas therapeutic benefits.
Fits most cups and tea pots.

Origin
